mdRecord.dcterms:title: Electric stimulator
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Shelton Electric Laboratories [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: metal; plastic (organic material); glass (material); wood (plant material) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Set includes 1 electric stimulator, Shelton Electric laboratories 110 volts; and 2 glass attachments. Case is lined with purple cloth.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
